WhipExamples/Color.cpp

00021 
00022 #include "whiptk/whip_toolkit.h"
00023 #include "whiptk/w2d_class_factory.h"
00024 
00025 extern WT_File *whip_file; //Assume this has been opened for writing elsewhere.
00026 
00027 WT_Result Color()
00028 {
00029     int x=0,y=0;
00030     WT_W2D_Class_Factory cf;
00031 
00032     //Set the rendition color from a new color object.
00033     whip_file->desired_rendition().color().set(255,255,255);
00034     //Create some geometry.
00035     WT_Logical_Point vP[3];
00036     vP[0] = WT_Logical_Point(x, y);
00037     vP[1] = WT_Logical_Point(x+50, y+50);
00038     WT_Polyline *p = cf.Create_Polyline(2, vP, WD_True);
00039     if (p==NULL) 
00040         return WT_Result::Out_Of_Memory_Error;
00041     //Serialize it.
00042     WD_CHECK(p->serialize (*whip_file));
00043 
00044     //Use the color at index zero of the current color map.
00045     whip_file->desired_rendition().color().set( whip_file->desired_rendition().color_map().map(0) );
00046     //Create some geometry.
00047     vP[0] = WT_Logical_Point(x, y+100);
00048     vP[1] = WT_Logical_Point(x+50, y+150);
00049     cf.Destroy(p);
00050     p = cf.Create_Polyline(2, vP, WD_True);
00051     if (p==NULL) 
00052         return WT_Result::Out_Of_Memory_Error;
00053 
00054     //Serialize it.
00055     WD_CHECK(p->serialize (*whip_file));
00056     cf.Destroy(p);
00057 
00058     return WT_Result::Success;
00059 }
